Hey Product Hunt! üëã I'm Tousif, founder of SocialMe Ai. The Story Behind Building This Feature: When you start a business, maintaining consistency on social media feels almost impossible. Some days you have time to create posts most days, you don‚Äôt. That‚Äôs exactly what I faced when I started managing my own and my clients‚Äô social media accounts. To solve that, I built SocialMeAI(still in beta), a tool that helped me write and schedule posts across Facebook, X, LinkedIn, and Instagram with ease. Problem solved, right? Not quite. While my tool helped with scheduling, after a while, a new problem emerged: what to post next? I was spending the few precious hours I had each week staring at my screen, completely out of ideas. I tried everything: manual research, spying on competitors, and doom-scrolling for trends. It was a massive time sink, and honestly, the ideas I found felt generic and uninspired. That‚Äôs when I realized something important there‚Äôs a disconnect between what businesses post and what their audience is actually searching for. This realization led to the feature I'm launching today. I built a system of AI agents that continuously scan social media platforms, search trends, and web discussions to uncover what your target audience is actively searching for or talking about. It uncovers the questions they're asking that no one is answering. Every morning, you receive an email packed with fresh post ideas your audience will actually care about completely free. The results were stunning. Suddenly, I started discovering untapped topics my competitors hadn‚Äôt even touched yet these were the exact subjects my audience wanted to discuss. These weren't just random AI-generated topics; they were insights into the real needs of my community. When my clients started using it, their engagement and views shot up. Why? Because for the first time, they were creating content that their audience genuinely wanted to see and talk about. We even started spotting niche trends weeks before they hit the mainstream. And if you can't wait for the email, there's a "Generator" page under the Ideas section to get instant quick ideas on any topic. If you‚Äôve ever struggled with finding what to post or wondered what your audience truly wants, this tool will surprise you. Give it a try. You‚Äôll discover ideas you haven‚Äôt thought of yet but your audience has been searching for all along. *Want to try it out?* I‚Äôm offering this as a FREE add-on to all the subscription plans of my main tool with limited credits that gets renewed every month because I believe every business deserves to bridge this gap. Each morning, you'll get an email with fresh post ideas tailored to your audience. *I'm here all day to:* - Answer any questions - Hear your feature ideas - Debug any issues you encounter Let me know what you think, I really care about your feedback !!! Me and my buddy run a small indie dev studio, and we were getting sick of how clunky, bloated, and overpriced most PDF scanner apps are.

So we built our own PDF scan & edit app ‚Äî lightweight, simple, and (hopefully) not annoying to use. No ads, no paywalls.

The major features are listed below:

100% offline ‚Äî on-device processing, no accounts, no tracking
Privacy & security ‚Äî add/remove passwords, open protected PDFs, flatten sensitive forms/annotations
Pro scanning ‚Äî auto edge detect, live corner adjust, batch multi-page
Scan quality ‚Äî B/W, grayscale, auto-brightness filters; instant preview & page reordering before save
OCR you control ‚Äî fast AI OCR, 12+ languages, preserves layout, searchable PDFs or clean text export
Edit OCR detected text - adjust every part of the detected text
Page tools ‚Äî merge, split, reorder, rotate, duplicate, delete in seconds
Forms & signatures ‚Äî fill forms, reusable digital signatures, flatten for secure sharing
Annotations ‚Äî text, highlights, comments; watermarks with custom text, opacity, angle, size
Insert & build ‚Äî add images or new pages into existing PDFs; create from photos
Compression ‚Äî shrink large PDFs without wrecking readability
Folder organization ‚Äî custom folders, drag & drop move/rename, save directly into target folders
Thumbnails & quick edit ‚Äî instant page previews, tap to jump and edit
